items.name: Storm's Gift
implicitMods: 25% reduced Elemental Ailment Duration on you
explicitMods: Shocks you inflict spread to other Enemies within 1.5 metres
flavourText: The power of lightning is a power best shared.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a ring of Lightning around you, followed by a larger Lightning nova. Each effect hits enemies caught in their area with Lightning Damage.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments
explicitMods: 54% increased Duration of Ailments inflicted with Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 54% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage with Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. explicitMods: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost 4 Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed

items.name: Storm Secret
explicitMods: Herald of Thunder also creates a storm when you Shock an Enemy
Herald of Thunder's Storms Hit Enemies with 50% increased Frequency
Take 250 Lightning Damage when Herald of Thunder Hits an Enemy
flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Release a beam which deals lightning damage to enemies in a long area in front of you, and has several smaller beams branch off from it at an angle, hitting more enemies to the sides.
explicitMods: This Spell loses 1 Intensity every 0.25 seconds while moving, or immediately if you teleport
This Spell gains Intensity when you Cast it, to a maximum of 3

+0.3 metres to Beam Width Per Intensity
33% less branching angle per Intensity
35% more Damage with Hits and Ailments per Intensity
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.

You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
Supported Skills have 31% reduced Curse Duration

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Duration Gems

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock
flavourText: Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.
